subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Bryce Alford’s shot with 13 seconds left went wide of the rim, but a Southern Methodist player touched the ball in the air, giving the Bruins 3 points and the final lead.
snippet: Bryce Alford’s shot with 13 seconds left went wide of the rim, but a Southern Methodist player touched the ball in the air, giving the Bruins 3 points and the final lead.
